long_description: Ideal for family hikes and use by young Cub Scouts, the REI Sprig 12 pack helps kids tackle their own daylong outdoor adventures. It's perfectly sized for kids ages 5 - 8. FreeFlow sculpted back panel reduces sweaty contact areas with peaks and valleys that let vapor escape; soft foam allows the pack to conform to kids' backs for a stable fit. Webbing hipbelt can be tucked away into its own pocket when not in use. Panel loading main compartment is easy to organize and access; hydration pocket fits a 50 fl. oz. hydration reservoir (sold separately). Elastic cord on the front provides a spot to stash a jacket and helps compress the pack body; mesh side pockets hold water bottles and afternoon snacks. Safety whistle is built into the sternum strap buckle so a child need never be without this 10 essentials item. The REI Sprig 12 pack is designed to keep the load close to the body for stability.
short_description: Ideal for family hikes and use by young Cub Scouts, the REI Sprig 12 pack helps kids tackle their own daylong outdoor adventures. It's perfectly sized for kids ages 5 - 8.
